Module.name: util

Function.name: latex(elem, rerender)
Function.span: Renders LaTeX markup as an using codecogs.com.

Arg.name: elem
Arg.span: An element or a sequence of elements containing LaTeX code to be rendered. These elements can contain a data-zoom atttribute specifying the equation size relative to the surrounding text, and a data-color attribute specifying the color as a LaTeX color name ("red") or as decimal RGB values ({255,0,0}).

Arg.name: rerender
Arg.span: Specifies whether to rerender elements that have been previously rendered. Useful when changing the size or color.

Module.Function: Replaces an equation image by the LaTeX code from which it was originally rendered. An element or a sequence of elements.
